item.title: The Dwarves Runs By Ideas
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Minimal human intervention Our operations runs on four branches: Account for client happiness arrangement - PeopleOps for resource allocation - Human Resource for recruitment and employee experience, & Communication for info transmission across the platforms.
